name: The 8th International Conference on Signal Processing Systems
content: The 8th International Conference on Signal Processing Systems (ICSPS 2016) is the main annual research conference aims to bring together top researchers around the world to exchange research results and address open issues in all aspects of Signal Processing Systems. The ICSPS 2009 to 2015 were held in Singapore, Dalian, Yantai, Kuala Lumpur, Sydney, Dubai, and Auckland respectively, and the current ICSPS 2016 will be held in AUT University, Auckland, New Zealand during November 21-24, 2016\. Publication 1\. Conference Proceedings: published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). 2\. International Journal of Signal Processing Systems (ISSN: 2315-4535) Abstracting/Indexing: Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, Engineering & Technology Digital Library, etc.
